summary:
**Lover (Taylor Swift album) Summary:**

Taylor Swift's "Lover," released in 2019, is her seventh studio album and first after leaving Big Machine Records. It explores various emotions about love and includes songs about political issues like LGBT rights. Musically, it blends 1980s-inspired pop with country and folk elements. Swift promoted it heavily and released five singles, three of which reached the top 10 on the Billboard Hot 100. Critics praised its emotional depth but found the musical styles sometimes inconsistent. It was nominated for a Grammy and was the best-selling album of 2019 worldwide.
title: Lover (album)
